definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
disaster-stricken/to be hit by a natural calamity
area particularly hard-hit by a disaster/disaster area
disaster prevention/to protect against natural disasters

sentences.english: With Meher Baba's great love in our hearts, external disasters can't harm us.
sentences.chinese: 有美赫巴巴之大恋爱藏在内心中，无外灾可伤害。

sentences.english: When the plague of leprosy is in a man, then he shall be brought unto the priest;
sentences.chinese: 人有了大痲疯的灾病，就要将他带到祭司面前。

sentences.english: The world polarization and economic globalization are developing circuitously.
sentences.chinese: 极化和经济全球化灾曲折中发展。

sentences.english: The seven angels have a golden sash each and one of the plagues in a bowl or vial of wrath.
sentences.chinese: 七位天使都有一金带与一装在大怒的碗里的灾。

sentences.english: Transmigration midstream Cheng He in years.
sentences.chinese: 灾岁月悳轮回中流成河。

sentences.english: In particular, Chongzhen disaster almost every year, everywhere is a bust of depression.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是崇祯年间几乎年年有灾，到处是一片萧条之景。

sentences.english: This calamity was caused by evil spirits, not because the gods were jealous.
sentences.chinese: 固鬼蜮之为灾，岂神灵之有妒。

sentences.english: The governments of Qin and Han dynasty took much account of organize the society to reduce disasters as well.
sentences.chinese: 秦汉政府注重禳灾，也很重视组织社会开展减灾工作。

sentences.english: This plague of darkness was the ninth of the punishments God brought on Egypt.
sentences.chinese: 神降在埃及的第九个灾，是黑暗之灾。

definition: fateful accident/inauspicious matter (involving death or casualties)
to terminate/to cut short/to bring to a stop/to squeeze/to tighten/to damage/variant of 殺|杀[sha1]
to rob/to plunder/to seize by force/to coerce/calamity/abbr. for kalpa 劫波[jie2 bo1]
